extracted_playbook.title: Update User Documentation
extracted_playbook.description: Update the user documentation in the next product version to address the identified issues.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is communication running over an untrusted network?

extracted_playbook.title: Switch to VPN for Secure Communication
extracted_playbook.description: Switch communication to run over a VPN to ensure full protection when using an untrusted network.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize and Protect Network Access
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize and protect network access to connected devices using state-of-the-art techniques and processes.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Devices in Protected Environment
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure devices are used only in a protected environment to minimize network exposure and prevent external access.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Firewalls
extracted_playbook.description: Use firewalls to protect and separate the control system network from other networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Activate User Management and Password Features
extracted_playbook.description: Activate and apply user management and password features to enhance security.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Encrypted Communication Links
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure communication links are encrypted to protect data in transit.

extracted_playbook.title: Limit Access to Development and Control Systems
extracted_playbook.description: Limit access to both development and control systems by physical means, operating system features, etc.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Up-to-date Virus Detection Solutions
extracted_playbook.description: Protect both development and control systems by using up-to-date virus detection solutions.
